question1.question: How can I create an event?
question1.answer: To create an event, log in, go to the 'Create Event' section, fill in the required fields, and publish.

question2.question: Can I edit an event after it has been published?
question2.answer: Yes, you can edit your event in the 'My Events' section as long as it hasn't started.

question3.question: Do I need to register to view events?
question3.answer: No, you can view events without registering, but you will need an account to create and manage events.

question4.question: How can I search for specific events?
question4.answer: Use the search engine on the main page and filter by category, date, or location.

question5.question: What types of events can I publish?
question5.answer: You can publish any type of event, such as concerts, workshops, conferences, or special promotions.

question6.question: Can I cancel an event once it's created?
question6.answer: Yes, you can cancel an event from the 'My Events' section if you no longer want it to happen.

question7.question: How long does a published event stay on the platform?
question7.answer: The event will be visible until the event date has passed or you choose to remove it.

question8.question: How can I highlight my event?
question8.answer: We offer options to highlight your event through subscriptions and additional payments.

question9.question: Can I share my event on social media?
question9.answer: Yes, you can directly share your event on social media from its detail page.

question1.question: What does the monthly subscription include?
question1.answer: The monthly subscription allows you to publish unlimited promotions for your events.

question2.question: How can I subscribe?
question2.answer: You can subscribe from your user profile in the 'Subscriptions' section.

question3.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
question3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time, but it will remain active until the end of the paid period.

question4.question: Are subscriptions automatically renewable?
question4.answer: Yes, subscriptions are automatically renewed each month unless you cancel them.

question5.question: Can I change my subscription plan?
question5.answer: Yes, you can change your plan from the 'Subscriptions' section in your account.

question6.question: What happens if I don’t pay my subscription?
question6.answer: If you don’t pay your subscription, you will no longer be able to publish more promotions until the payment is regularized.

question7.question: Do I receive a reminder before my subscription is renewed?
question7.answer: Yes, we will send you an email reminder before the renewal.

question8.question: Do subscriptions include any discount for featured events?
question8.answer: Yes, subscribers get discounts to highlight events on the platform.

question9.question: Can I get an annual subscription?
question9.answer: We currently only offer monthly subscriptions, but we are evaluating other options.

question1.question: What payment methods are available?
question1.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal payments.

question2.question: Can I pay for a single event instead of subscribing?
question2.answer: Yes, you can pay for events individually without needing a subscription.

question3.question: How are subscription payments made?
question3.answer: The payment is made automatically each month using the method you registered.

question4.question: What happens if my subscription payment fails?
question4.answer: We will notify you, and you will have time to update your payment method before the subscription is suspended.

question5.question: Can I get a refund for a paid event?
question5.answer: Event payments are non-refundable unless the event is canceled by the organizer.

question6.question: Is VAT included in the prices?
question6.answer: Yes, all prices include the applicable VAT.

question7.question: How can I check my invoices?
question7.answer: You can review and download your invoices from the 'Payment History' section in your profile.

question8.question: Can I change my payment method?
question8.answer: Yes, you can update your payment method in the 'Payments' section of your account.

question9.question: Is there an additional cost for highlighting an event?
question9.answer: Yes, highlighting an event has an additional cost depending on the visibility you want to achieve.

question1.question: I can't access my account, what should I do?
question1.answer: Try resetting your password from the 'Forgot your password?' option on the login page.

question2.question: The site is not loading correctly, how can I fix it?
question2.answer: Check your internet connection or try clearing your browser's cache and cookies.

question3.question: My event is not showing, what can I do?
question3.answer: Make sure the event has been published correctly and is not marked as a draft.

question4.question: How do I report a technical issue?
question4.answer: You can report issues from the 'Technical Support' section in your account or by emailing us at {supportEmail}.

question5.question: My subscription payment failed, how do I resolve it?
question5.answer: Try updating your payment method or contact support if the issue persists.

question6.question: How do I fix image upload errors?
question6.answer: Make sure the image meets the size and format requirements, then try again.

question7.question: The site is down, how long until it's back online?
question7.answer: Our team is working to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We will notify you once it's operational.

question8.question: I am having trouble updating my event, what should I do?
question8.answer: Ensure your connection is stable and that all required fields are filled out.

question9.question: The search system isn't finding my event, why?
question9.answer: It may take a few minutes to index after publication. If the issue persists, contact technical support.

question1.question: How can I create an account?
question1.answer: Click 'Sign Up' on the main page and follow the steps to create your account.

question2.question: How can I change my password?
question2.answer: You can change your password from the 'Account Settings' section in your profile.

question3.question: Can I delete my account?
question3.answer: Yes, you can delete your account from the settings, but you will lose all your events and associated data.

question4.question: How can I update my personal information?
question4.answer: Go to 'My Profile' and edit the information you need to update.

question5.question: Can I link my account to social media?
question5.answer: We currently do not offer direct social media integration, but you can share your events on them.

question6.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
question6.answer: Use the 'Forgot your password?' option on the login page to reset it.

question7.question: How can I verify my email?
question7.answer: After registering, you will receive an email with a verification link to activate your account.

question8.question: How do I protect my account from unauthorized access?
question8.answer: Enable two-factor authentication in the 'Security' section of your profile.

question9.question: How do I manage my notifications?
question9.answer: You can manage your notification preferences from the 'Settings' section in your account.
